interfaces

Interface CalculatorBasicOperations

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CalculatorAdvancedOperations
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Calculator, SciCalculator

    public interface CalculatorBasicOperations
    Interface for the square root mathematical operation and the four basic mathematical operations(addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) Uses numbers of the type double.
    Author:
    Ruben

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double add(double number1, double number2)
      Returns the sum of two numbers added together
      double divide(double number1, double number2)
      Returns the quotient of two numbers
      double multiply(double number1, double number2)
      Returns the product of two numbers
      double squareroot(double number1)
      Returns the square root of a number
      double subtract(double number1, double number2)
      Returns the difference between two numbers
